about.description: I’m a Frontend Developer based in Borken, NRW, Germany. I enjoy helping designers and companies bring their ideas to life. I’d be happy to support your team with my ability to solve complex problems, combined with my passion for programming.
about.description2: If you think I'd be a good fit for your projects, please feel free to contact me!
about.title: About me
contact.description: Contact me through this form. I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
